title: Email attachment of Excel files becomes symbol...
content:
Someone send me an email with EXCEL attachment but the files I received using Thundermail mail client the attachments becomes symbols and cannot be opened. (see attached image)

The same email was also cc copy to my hotmail account and I can see the attachment from my hotmail which is an EXCEL file and I can open it and use it as normal.

Anyone know how to fix this?

Other files like PDF, JPEG are no problem.

This problem only happen in one of the people who send me the Excel file, other people who send me Excel I can read and open normally so far.
creator: ykt2369

title: problema inserimento etichette
content: Buongiorno, dopo la creazione di una nuova etichetta e l'assegnazione ad una mail, la stessa sparisce, la versione di thunderbird è l'ultima e la rete funziona. Grazie
creator: darkacc347

title: nella RUBRICA NUOVO CONTATTO non si può più salvare un numero telefonico
content: - nella Barra Menù è sparita la Rubrica che è stata spostata nelle "tendina" Strumenti, perchè? - nella Rubrica quando si aggiunge un Nuovo Contatto non c'è più la casella per memorizzare un numero telefonico, ma solo "siti web" con predefinita la sigla https://, perchè?
creator: franz.miretti

title: Path Destination is Server Folder
content:
Hi all Our Company have many Servers and we can see it in Windows File Explorer, like L:\, G:\ W:\ I copy the folder full path like T:\asset\common\ and paste in mail use Ctrl + K. But when I click the hyperlink, it will appear a dialog to select program to open it Can it Setup like windows livemail, folder path will open use File Explorer, image path will open use photo viewer...etc ?

now i only can copy the path in mail, and paste to File Explorer

Thanks all
creator: erts.prime

title: Add email address to account
content:
david Feb 8, 2023, 12:10:43 AM If I understand correctly, the two accounts will be visible in left side, each with separate inbox, sent folder, etc. You can toggle between the two by clicking the desired folder to access.

I don't necessarily need the 2 accounts side by side but merely the ability to toggle between the two
creator: philipinjozi

title: Keeping current emails & folders when connecting a new email account
content:
Hello! Not sure if I selected the best topic for my question.

I've been using Thunderbird with absolutely no problems for quite a few years. Love it! I will be changing internet providers and will not be able to keep my current email address so I created a new Gmail address. I know there's info on how to connect the Gmail account to my Thunderbird installation, which I will attempt to do. However, from my current email provider I have thousands of emails and quite a few folders and I would like to keep all those emails and folders in my Thunderbird after I leave the provider even though it will be disconnected. Like historical information I suppose. Is this possible in Thunderbird? I know I will disconnect from current provider in the connection settings, but when I connect to Gmail, will my emails and folders still remain?

I hope I explained my question ok, thanks in advance for any advice.
creator: christiedknoxby2

title: Migrating events and tasks
content:
Running Thunderbird 102.7.2 (64-bit).

When I copy old local.sqlite file to newly created C:\Users\User\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\r1v9h1uu.default-release\calendar-data, it doesn't update my clendar with niether events nor tasks.

Local.sqlite file has over 4 MB. I've opened it via online viewer and can see my events and tasks in it.

Please advise.
creator: amarpap

title: Exports for lightning/calendar and address books not working
content:
Installed new 102.7.2 64 bit Thunderbird as a new install, not upgrade.

Have old 102.6.1 64 bit version that keeps taking 10 seconds to halt/spinning circle with calendar and address books. Upgrading it. Export of calendar (2x) shows a file of 3.31MB, from old version. New version imports but shows nothing on the calendar. Export of all address books doesn't show any of my lists.

Any ideas?

Thanks,

Vic
creator: nichollsvi2

title: Add a New Account
content:
david Feb 8, 2023, 11:02:35 PM

Yes, exactly. When you create the second account, it will all be immediately visible to you.

Thank you, all is sorted now
creator: philipinjozi

title: When I open an email message, it automatically goes to the "reply" or "write" mode
content:
I found the issue, archived from 2021, which describes my problem, quoted below. But the solution ( inbox set to drafts) doesn't help for me. It's been happening fr a while - sort of crept up on me so I'm not sure when it happened.

The issue appears to be the same as......

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Patt Opdyke 2/11/21, 5:28 PM

When I open an email message, it automatically goes to the "reply" or "write" mode. I can't just view the email. This means that I can't open links in an email. This just started happening. How do I fix this? ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ My inbox is set to local folders. It happens to any email, irrespective of the email account it's come from. It happens in my log in on the family PC. Not in my wife's email accounts in her log in. I've tried trouble shooting mode in case it's an add-on. This makes no difference. Win 10 TB version 102.7.2 . I've done a screenshot. I double clicked on a message in my inbox (chosen at random, but safe to display publicly) Help would be appreciated.
creator: terrybernstein

title: unable to send & receive emails
content: Our office has been using Thumderbird for our emails for several years now, just recently, we have been unable to receive or send emails on some of our computers.
creator: denise40

title: Nastavení odpovědního mailu
content:
Dobrý den, rád bych si na určité období nastavil odpovědní mail ohledně nepřítomnosti.

Děkuji

Radek Konečný tel.605264001
creator: radek.konecny

title: Managing forwarding to multiple e-mails
content:
I'm running a general e-mail on a company, and I have to forward incoming e-mail from various clients to their respective account manager/sales person or other.

What I have done for the past year is create filters for each client that forward automatically, and it works ok, but doesn't provide me with much flexibility. I can't quickly change all of the clients that are forwarding to a determined e-mail/sales person, for this to happen I would need to change each filter individually.

I've thought of using an add-on like Auto Tag, so I can assign the clients e-mail to their respective account manager for all incoming e-mail, and then have only a filter for each tag, so then I would be able to at least switch all e-mail assigned to that person with one filter.

I would appreciate suggestions on how I can achieve more flexibility and easier management.

Thank you.
creator: yellowmatter

title: Emails don't download I use POP3 it has worked just fine for years. Asks for a password to enter the email did the primary password that gets the program but nothing else. I am using 102.6.1 did try 102.7.1 and had more errors so I went back to 102.6.1 .
content: Help me figure out how to get my Thunderbird program to let me in and download messages. I put in a primary password and that seems to work but the account passwords I do not know and now there isn't a Saved Identity or password in that box? I have a real frustration with this. I was on 102.6.1 and in this process I saw there was an update to 102.7.1 so I downloaded it but it made even more problems and then I read a page that the BETA people had lots of problems with this and it doesn't seem to be fixed so I removed it and went back to 102.6.1 and nothing has changed.
creator: linmann1

title: Thunderbird pauses while drafting an email
content: Thunderbird lags or pauses while composing an email. Sometimes significantly. I have found that If I disconnect from the internet this does not happen. Is TBird send data out while composing? Is there a viable solution? Thank you for any assistance
creator: michaelr2

title: shortcuts CTRL + SHIFT + R - sth strange
content: Starting from today I've noticed very strange function when I try to CTRL + SHIFT + R. So far Answer to all recepients. But from today it does that message disappears and the dialog window is shown with info and option: Mark messages as read from <empty_field> till <today's_date>. When I try to find the message which disappeared I can find it in search results and its location is a directory: 2023. I haven't created this directory. When I try to use combination CTRL + SHIFT + R when chosen message moved to 2023 (search results) message dissapears again but for good (of course dialog window as described before is shown again). Has any body experienced the same? Any clues what happened? Any new update? How to restore proper action for CTRL + SHIFT + R?
creator: mirek1

title: Move sent emails to another folder
content:
When I move an already successfully sent email from folder "sent" to another folder, the email disappears in the "sent" folder (which should be o.k.), but is not visible in the destination folder. When I afterwards search for that email, it can be found an opened from the search window. When I copy the email to another folder, it remains in the "sent" folder, but does not appear in the destination folder. Same is true with all Add-ons disabled.

Thunderbird version 102.7.2 Windows 10 POP3 EMail Provider: gmx Antivirus: Avast v. 22.12 Firewall: Microsoft
creator: heinz.melion

title: Threads (latest upgrade)
content: How to turn "threads" off. Options in under Views not clear if the Thread process is off or user can have a mix and match of threaded, unthreaded, or a few of both in the folder. Using the lastest upgrade of T'bird on Win 11.
creator: Wxhd

title: Missing Attachments - from only one email account/server
content: I am getting emails from a business contact with their own domain. They send me attachments that I see on my phone, and INITIALLY on TB. But, after the email loads in TB....the attachment disappears. So, on my computer, I have to go to MY email at the website and download it rather than using TB. I use TB to consolidate all my different email accounts...but this is now pushing me away from TB if I have to go online to check the emails anyhow. Thoughts????
creator: younghowie

title: Importing from Outlook 2010
content:
I am new to Mozilla/Thunderbird. After years of using Microsoft 2010 my ISP provider has sent notification that email support will stop by March 30, 2023. I have mulled through getting email to work and now I am trying to import my address book and my calendar from Office 2010.

Another question related to Thunderbird I have not found were there is and exit icon to close Thunderbird. I have been just clicking the Red X in the upper right corner to close Thunderbird down.

I would appreciate any and all help for these items.

Richard G
creator: rdg_tech

title: Text missing from saved emails
content: Hello, I have been looking through some old emails that I've saved in Thunderbird, some of them have no text at all in them. It's occurred in some of the emails in at least two separate folders (I have not looked at every folder or every email that I saved). I cannot understand how that could have happened. Any suggestions as to what is going on, and especially if there is a way to retrieve the text, that would be quite helpful, Thanks
creator: bobbob3

title: Solved (I think) - New account not accepted
content:
I am in the process of switching email servers and wish to continue using the same email (custom domain). I have successfully set this up with the new server but cannot create a new Thunderbird account. I keep getting the same message: "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password." Everything is correct, however. I am wondering whether the issue is that there already is an account with the same email. It is no longer functional, but is it possible that Thunderbird will not accept the new account unless I delete the old one? I wouldn't do that, given that I keep my emails forever and often refer back to them. If this is my problem, how can I simply deactivate the old account? Or, if this isn't the problem, what is? Each time I click "re-test" on the Account Setup page, my server settings are confirmed.

(I initially tried simply changing all the settings on the old account, without success.)

I think I've figured it out. The new server assigned a different password than the one I chose when setting up the account.
creator: mainedruid

title: Thunderbird 102.7.2 Calendar changes to read only
content:
The calendar changes to the "read only" mode after updating and also at other times.

When I change it back to be editable the calendar doesn't show ANY data and there is a note that the calendar is temporarily unavailable. I've waited up to 20 minutes various times but there is still no data until I restart Thunderbird.

Is there way to prevent the switch to read only?
creator: ccoons4419

title: Print job (2pgs per sheet) sent from Thunderbird; Deletes print job from Queue before printing
content:
Hello,

Note, this only appears to happen when printing an Email message from Thunderbird (Vs 102.7.2; see my testing details at the bottom of this message).

I often print '2 pages per sheet' to save paper that's the only time I see it occur.

Here's what happens with my HP 8620 Pro printer, only when I print using '2 pages per sheet' from Thunderbird:

      • 1. I set up the print job to print "2 pages per sheet" (usually "all pages" & sometimes a subset). ***

2. I send the print job to the printer. 3. I see the print job in the queue. (Queue Status: "Printing") 4. The printer prepares to "print" (makes some movements, but, doesn't actually print anything). 5. The print job is deleted from the queue before anything can be printed. - I see this in the queue: Status: "Deleting  - Printing" And then it's gone...

- If I change the print job to print "1 page per sheet" it works fine. - If I change the print job to print "1 page per sheet" and "2-sided" it works fine.

- I'm using Windows 10 Pro on my HP Envy 750se Desktop. - This only started happening in the last few months- since (September?) when I changed from using SeaMonkey to Thunderbird as my primary Emailer.

I've been using the previous-latest HP Driver, and I, just days ago, updated to the latest (May, 2022) HP Driver and it's still happening. Nothing else changed with this printer or my computer, except Windows 10 updates, to my knowledge.

Testing: I tested this ("2 pages per sheet") with Google Chrome on my Windows 10 Pro Desktop and there is no problem.

I tested this("2 pages per sheet") with my HP Windows 7 Pro Laptop: - Printing from Thunderbird: this problem *does* exist. - Printing from SeaMonkey: this problem *does not* exist. - Printing from Google Chrome: this problem *does not* exist.

Thank you for any help or suggestions! Jim
creator: jdecaro

title: android download
content: Started tafe and need my mail app {thunderbird} on my android so i can quickly access emails Do you have one ? and i need help going through the process
